Field.Name: SP_TenantUrl
Field.Description: The Tenant Admin URL. Example: https://contoso-admin.sharepoint.com/

Field.Name: SP_SiteProvisioningTemplate
Field.Description: The Name of the provisioning Template.

Field.Name: SP_TemplateImageUrl
Field.Description: Enter the Url of the Image for the Template

Field.Name: SP_UseTemplateSitePolicy
Field.DisplayName: Use Site Policy defined in template

Field.Name: SP_Url
Field.Description: The path used for the site collection URL. Example: https://contoso.sharepoint.com/sites/<urlpath>

Field.Name: SP_TimeZone
Field.Description: The time zone selected for the site

Field.Name: SP_Template
Field.Description: The Site Template to apply. For instance STS#0.

Field.Name: SP_RequestOnPrem
Field.Description: Indicates if the Site is targeting SharePoint On-Premises.

Field.Name: SP_Props
Field.Description: Field that stores custom property bag entries.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Site Templates Data
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Repository for the XML based site templates

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Site Requests
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Repository for new Site Collection Requests

pnp:DataRow.pnp:DataValue: (UTC-04:00) Georgetown, La Paz, Manaus, San Juan
(UTC+01:00) Amsterdam, Berlin, Bern, Rome, Stockholm, Vienna
(UTC+02:00) Helsinki, Kyiv, Riga, Sofia, Tallinn, Vilnius
